comment: In PEI Electoral Reform Plebiscite , FPTP gets most votes in FPTP voting method . Ironically , using a Preferential Ballot method , MMPR wins .
amr:
# ::snt In PEI Electoral Reform Plebiscite , FPTP gets most votes in FPTP voting method . Ironically , using a Preferential Ballot method , MMPR wins .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (t / thing
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "TP"))
            :ARG1 (v / vote-01
                  :ARG1 t
                  :mod (m2 / most))
            :ARG2 (m3 / method
                  :instrument-of (v2 / vote-01
                        :ARG1 t))
            :location (p / plebiscite
                  :topic (r / reform-01
                        :ARG1 (e / elect-01))
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Phillipines"))))
      :snt2 (w / win-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / thing
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "MMPR"))
            :manner (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (m4 / method
                        :instrument-of (v3 / vote-01)
                        :mod (p2 / Preferential)))
            :mod (ii / ironic)))
